title: [COMPLETE] Live Network Maintenance - 1am AEDT, 2nd April
body:
**UPDATE@ 01:15am** The maintenance has been completed successfully.  Loss prevented was enabled as a precaution during the change window, and has since been disabled again.


~~~

Hi all,

Tonight we'll be performing a brief network maintenance to remove one of our peering partners at 1am AEDT.  Players on iiNet, Spark, Dodo, iPrimus and potentially other ISPs are likely to experience a brief disconnect from games in progress around that time.

This is a follow-up from last nights issues, and will allow the partner to perform maintenance to their network to prevent it happening in the future.

Please keep an eye on this thread and the server status page for any updates.

Cheers
Mindstar

replies.body: Yeah any idea how long ranked will be disabled for?

If one is in game will players experience lag?
{{summoner:3}}
You might get briefly disconnected from game when the changes are made.
i just played  a game and only got 8lp

same goes 9lp for a win got anything to do with this?
{{item:3070}}

It does.  We enabled loss prevented as a precaution while we did these changes.  This means players won't lose LP if they lose a game, and will get reduced LP for wins.  It has been turned off again now, so new games will have normal LP loss / gain.
how long is ranked going to be down for?
